participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: Charismatic and confident, enjoys performing and has a great sense of humor.
participant_1.background: Frank grew up in a musical family and has always had a passion for singing and harmonizing with others.

participant_2.name: Wally
participant_2.personality: Playful and witty, often uses humor to connect with others and lighten the mood.
participant_2.background: Wally comes from a background in theater and has experience in various performance arts, which enhances his love for music.

content.text: And, Frank, Bill, Wally, y'all harmonize like the best barbershop quartet, and there's only three of you.
